sentences.en: A stele that has a solid core of vascular tissue.
sentences.cn: 原生中柱一种有管状组织的实心中柱.

sentences.en: China's export stone materials are mainly granite, stele , building stone materials, sheet and manufactured goods.
sentences.cn: 中国出口的石材主要是花岗石 、 碑石和建筑用石, 以板材和制成品为主.

sentences.en: Collect archaic stele , portraits of Roman emperors, and pottery.
sentences.cn: 收藏古体的石碑、罗马皇帝的肖像和陶器。

sentences.en: Exarch Denoting a stele in which the metaxylem develops to the inside of the protoxylem.
sentences.cn: 外始式:指后生木质部在原生木质部之内的中柱类型.

sentences.en: First published straight from the stele in 1902, the book begins by detailing the names of numerous members of the royal family dating back to the 1st Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 纸质书1902年出版，直接临摹石碑，书的开头不厌其烦地罗列从第一王朝以来无数王室成员的名字。

sentences.en: It also enriches the data for study of the Bi Sheng tomb stele.
sentences.cn: 其发现丰富了“毕升墓碑”深入研究的实物资料.

sentences.en: Many temples on the mountain, stele, Qulang Pavilion, shade trees.
sentences.cn: 山上殿宇林立, 碑碣夹道,亭阁曲廊, 绿树掩映.

sentences.en: Outside of stele the cortical meristem developed into cortex, epidermis and the root cap subsequently.
sentences.cn: 中柱外面的皮层分生组织,将来发展成为皮层 、 表皮层和根冠.

sentences.en: Renovate the historic building and the celebrity stele inscription . Construct reception and service facilities.
sentences.cn: 修复古建筑及名人碑刻, 建设餐饮、休闲、住宿等服务配套设施.

sentences.en: Temple stele Datacom , described the history of temple architecture, such as age.
sentences.cn: 寺内碑碣数通, 记述寺史建筑年代等.

sentences.en: That black stele let me be shocked!
sentences.cn: 那座座黑色石碑让我震撼!

sentences.en: The inscription on the stele tells the history of Lamaism.
The pith of this stemlike stele appears rather strongly like collenchyma tissue.
sentences.cn: 茎状中柱的髓显得颇强健,像厚角组织.

sentences.en: The stele includes all primary tissues derived from the procambium consists of pericycle, phloem and xylem.
sentences.cn: 中柱包括从原形成层衍生而来的全部初生组织,由中柱鞘 、 韧质部和木质部组成.

sentences.en: The stele records the reasons why Abbot Faxian built the pagoda.
sentences.cn: “四神咒塔”碑记载住持法现建塔缘起.

sentences.en: The tissues of the stele and cortex are derived from the corpus.
sentences.cn: 中柱和皮层组织就是来源于原体.

sentences.en: There are also many temples , ancient temples, stone stele, ancient tombs, and other cultural footprints.
sentences.cn: 此外还有许多古刹庙宇 、 石刻碑碣 、 古塔古墓等文物足迹.

sentences.en: We do have a victory hymn, a victory hymn that's inscribed on a stele that's a slab of stone--which was erected in the year 1204 BCE.
sentences.cn: 我们确实有胜利颂歌，刻在石碑上的胜利颂歌,那是一块石板，立于公元前1204年。

trans.tran_cn: 石碑，石柱，匾额，墙刻，碑碣，中柱
trans.tran_en: an upright stone slab or column decorated with figures or inscriptions, common in prehistoric times
